title: Didnt get the Xayah and Rakan Icon
body:
I didn't get the first icon with the two feathers on them. Have all of them been distributed yet?
Thanks!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

AFAIK, these should have been distributed! I'm super sorry you didn't receive yours. ;_; If you hit up our friends in player support [via a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they'll be able to look at your account, see you completed the criteria for the icon, and grant it!

Huh, you should have gotten it by May 10. Try opening up a Support Ticket and just tell them that you completed the unlock conditions but did not receive the Summoner Icon within the distribution period!
